title: fvHelper
description: These is helper css classes of Framevuerk.

class.name: .fv-hidden
class.description: Hide element.

class.name: .fv-hidden-{xs|sm|md|lg|xl}
class.description: Hide element based on viewport size

class.name: .fv-{margin|padding}
class.description: Apply configured padding variable of framevuerk to padding/margin of element.

class.name: .fv-{margin|padding}-sm
class.description: Apply half size of configured padding variable of framevuerk to padding/margin of element.

class.name: .fv-no-{margin|padding}
class.description: Remove padding/margin from element.

class.name: .fv-{margin|padding}-{start|end|top|buttom}
class.description: Apply configured padding variable of framevuerk to padding/margin of mentioned direction of element.

class.name: .fv-{margin|padding}-{start|end|top|buttom}-sm
class.description: Apply half size of configured padding variable of framevuerk to padding/margin of mentioned direction of element.

class.name: .fv-border
class.description: Apply border to element based on color of framevuerk configured bg-color.

class.name: .fv-no-border
class.description: Remove border from element.

class.name: .fv-border-{start|end|top|buttom}
class.description: Apply border to mentioned direction of element based on color of framevuerk configured bg-color.

class.name: .fv-{text|bg}-{primary|secondary|info|danger|warning|light|dark}
class.description: Apply mentioned color to text/background of element based on colors in config file.

class.name: .fv-text-{start|end|center|justify|left|right}
class.description: Apply mentioned text align to element based of framevuerk configured direction.

class.name: .fv-font-mono
class.description: Apply monospace font to element.

class.name: .fv-dir-{start|end}
class.description: Apply direction to element based of framevuerk configured direction.

class.name: .fv-{rtl|ltr}
class.description: Apply direction to element.

class.name: .fv-shadow
class.description: Apply shadow to element.

class.name: .fv-no-shadow
class.description: Remove shadow from element.

class.name: .fv-radius
class.description: Apply border-radius to element.

class.name: .fv-no-radius
class.description: Remove border-radius from element.

class.name: .fv-pull-{start|end}
class.description: Apply float of element to mentioned direction.

class.name: .fv-clear-both
class.description: Set clear css prop to both.

class.name: .fv-pointer
class.description: Set mouse cursor to finger on hover of element.

class.name: .fv-link
class.description: Apply link style to a element.

class.name: .fv-hr
class.description: Apply line style to hr element.

class.name: .fv-block
class.description: Apply display block style to element.

class.name: .fv-inline-block
class.description: Apply display inline-block style to element.

class.name: .fv-inline
class.description: Apply display inline style to element.

class.name: .fv-flex-{col|row}
class.description: Apply display flex style to element with flex-direction set to column/row.

class.name: .fv-grow
class.description: Apply flex-grow: 1 style to element.

class.name: .fv-disabled
class.description: Apply default disabled style of Framevuerk to element.

class.name: .fv-invalid
class.description: Apply default invalid style (mostly uses for box input element) of Framevuerk to element.
